name: My Figure Collection app for Android
body:
### Welcome to My Figure Collection app for Android page.
My Figure Collection is a great site where you can manage your manga related figurines and objects collection. In order to keep this amazing service everywhere with you, even without a data connection, I created the first application linked to My Figure Collection, available on Android. This application code is open source, and you can even help me to maintain it :)

![logo](https://lh5.ggpht.com/ITvo9BXMbJGBeGKd2226nHVil7ZKlWSfesDDf5eQwdIJkGXkitgieNjoxJHXp-AJHaA=w705)

### Dependances
This project has some dependances to external librairies:
* 'com.android.support:appcompat-v7:+'
* 'com.android.support:support-v4:+'
* 'com.github.gabrielemariotti.cards:library:1.9.1'
* 'commons-lang:commons-lang:2.6'
* 'com.google.code.gson:gson:2.2.+'
* 'com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp:1.2.+'
* 'com.octo.android.robospice:robospice-google-http-client:1.4.+'
* 'com.octo.android.robospice:robospice-ui-spicelist:1.4.+'
* 'com.octo.android.robospice:robospice-cache:1.4.+'
* 'com.octo.android.robospice:robospice-okhttp:1.4.+'
* 'com.tonicartos:stickygridheaders:1.0.+'
* 'se.emilsjolander:stickylistheaders:2.1.+'
* 'javax.annotation:javax.annotation-api:1.2'
* 'com.github.chrisbanes.actionbarpulltorefresh:extra-abc:+'
* 'com.google.http-client:google-http-client:1.19.+'
* 'com.google.http-client:google-http-client-android:1.19.+'
* 'com.google.http-client:google-http-client-gson:1.19.+'
* 'com.octo.android.robospice:robospice:1.4.+'

### Contact
Please contact me on My Figure Collection : [Climbatize](http://myfigurecollection.net/profile/Climbatize)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
